price: Mula sa harap niya ay Impiyerno, at paiinumin siya ng tubig na nana.
arabic: مِّن وَرَآئِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ وَيُسۡقَىٰ مِن مَّآءٖ صَدِيدٖ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: min warāihi jahannamu wayus'qā min māin ṣadīdin
translations: and he will be made to drink
